mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Checklist of Cerambycidae, Disteniidae and Vesperidae (Coleoptera) primary types of the Museu de Zoologia, Universidade de São Paulo, São Paulo, Brazil

subSubSection.paragraph:
Lectotype : Brazil , Minas Gerais : Mar de Espanha , 23.X.1909 , J.F. Zikán. The specimen is herein designated as the lectotype in order to stabilize the taxonomy and facilitate further identification of this species. Junior synonym of
Eryphus bipunctatus Perty, 1832

Lectotype : Brazil , Minas Gerais : Passa Quatro, J.F. Zikán. The specimen is herein designated as the lectotype in order to stabilize the taxonomy and facilitate further identification of this species.

Junior synonym of
Callideriphus grossipes grossipes Blanchard, 1851
